attributes.additional_details: The aim of this petition is to urge the government to take stronger action against website that propagate hate speech, incite violence, and brainwash the youth to commits acts of terrorism website such as http://radiotvbendele.com/index., Radio Bendele has been advocating hatred, acts of terrorist and violence within the Congolese community and beyond, so far those in authority have failed to take action against this online radio and the people running who are destroying the lives of many with their hates speech.
